DOC.brief_summary: To identify patients that are at risk of heart damage after receiving chemotherapy (adriamycin).
DOC.detailed_description: To identify patients at risk of development of heart damage after receiving chemotherapy by obtaining the genetic profile of those who show: elevation of troponin, left ventricular systolic and diastolic dysfunction, and pro-oxidant stress markers.
DOC.criteria: undergoing anthracycline and/or trastuzumab therapy for the first time abnormal ventricular ejection fraction past history of, or active cardiac disease including: MI, CHF, angina, arrhythmia requiring medication, valvular disease, uncontrolled systemic hypertension
